name: the shitty shooter
description:
I made a game. I cannot deny that. It has a start, a playable part and an end.

This game has been created in a few hours during and for the ludum dare 42 compo.

Please enjoy.

Move your ship with WASD. Use the Mouse to shoot.

Interdimensional eggs will spawn aliens. These eggs are interdimensional and cannot be messed with.

 Don't let them get you. They will lay interdimensional eggs after some time.
